name: Ringies
description: The story of funny little friends who got into trouble and found themselves far away from home. They need your help to get back home! Your journey will be peppered with wonderful adventures and incredible tests.
minimum_requirements: OS: 2000/XP/7/8/10 Processor: Pentium III 1GHz Processor Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX Compatible 16 or 32-bit Video Card with 64MB VRAM DirectX: Version 8.0 Storage: 25 MB available space Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card

reviews.review_text: Really simple and cute game , but it's really boring in time. Not even have trading cards. It isn't worth your time :(
